接了，仅发几个有代表性的商店页面链接。有兴趣的玩家可以直接百度本帖提到过的中文名，在百度百科中就可以查看英文名字，然后到Steam搜索即可购买。本指南只盘点可以在您个人资料上+1的游戏（包括在售游戏和下架绝版游戏），被V社剔除无法+1的游戏不做盘点（这里指的是学习版、试玩版和触犯条例被下架的游戏）。

No matter how much you hate certain aspects of the game, like:

the community, the updates, wall hackers, smurfs, derankers, fps, little kids (or girls, you never know), spin botters, russians, toxicity, the french, silvers, global elites, stoners, drunk brits, people who don't give callouts, people who can't stop giving callouts, the krieg, people who don't know about discord, distorted mics, crates, skins, trade bans, scammers, 64 tick, VAC, broken keyboards, broken wrists, tryhards, whiffs, pressing E a million times to pick up a weapon, pressing spacebar instead of shooting, switching weapons instead of shooting, bullets disappearing, getting knifed, getting zeus'd, losing

you will keep playing CS GO until you remember you have to work/go to school/wake up in 2 hours.

Ниже этого только черви в земле

I really like the play style of the game. A lot of the game seems very skill base which rewards someone for getting better at but what I dislike about the game is hackers ever so often come and play and ruin that fun. No amount effort or skill can beat this. This is also happens very often in silver and gold leagues. Wish this could be fixed
